strings.evolution:
I promise to be of use to you.
I dedicate myself to carrying out my will.
strings.affinity:
To have been able to fight with
you until now...I'm so grateful.
I hope I can be of help to you.
strings.description: A citizen of the Olderion Federation, bestowed the position of water priestess. Her and all the members of her family are known as the "Wardens," people charged with protecting the water crystal, but as the Water Priestess she has the tremendous power of being able to wield the power of the water crystal, making her a pillar of Olderion society.
strings.fusion:
This power...
Surely, I can use this to glorify the waters!
strings.summon:
The crystals have entrusted
you all with a great burden.
I also wish to help you.

strings.evolution:
I have...new power?
It must be a gift from the water crystals.
strings.affinity:
To have been able to fight with
you until now...I'm so grateful.
I hope I can be of help to you.
strings.description: A water priestess from the Olderion Federation. She has received the protection of the water crystal despite being so young, the power of which she uses to support the daily lives of her fellow citizens. Though kind and welcoming to all she comes across, she has dedicated her life to serving her people, and when the time comes she hides within her something that even her brothers couldn't match.
strings.fusion:
I'm so happy!
I can be even more useful to you all now!
strings.summon: I can feel the protection of the water crystal. I will go along with you all.

strings.affinity:
To have been able to fight with
you until now...I'm so grateful.
I hope I can be of help to you.
strings.description: A water priestess charged with protecting the Olderion Federation. She has a deep bond with the water crystal, the incredible power of which she uses to cleanse the waters that protect the city from monsters. She also has two brothers, both of whom serve in protecting their country.
strings.fusion:
Thank you very much.
I'll do my best to get stronger!
strings.summon:
Somehow, these memories...
I will do my best to be of use to you all.
